alert.note: Alert for Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, northeastern Logan, southwestern Sheridan and northwestern Gove Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monument, or 5 miles west of Oakley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakley. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 66 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
